definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: In this paper, we discuss the classification of 3-dimensionally commutative algebras on algebraically closed field.
sentences.chinese: 研究了代數閉域上三維交換代數的分類。

sentences.english: Students should have some familiarity with commutative algebra and basic topology.
sentences.chinese: 學生需要對交換代數和基本拓撲學有一定的瞭解。
